channel.title: CVE Feed for Toshiba Lighting & Technology Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toshiba Lighting & Technology Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2237|2024-08-05T13:48:04.355Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier. Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-16198|2024-08-05T10:17:38.374Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a%20and%20toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw26a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier may allow an attacker on the same network segment to access a non-documented developer screen to perform operations on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2018-16199|2024-08-05T10:17:38.382Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a%20and%20toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw26a
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier allows an remote attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-16201|2024-08-05T10:17:38.280Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a%20and%20toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw26a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow an attacker on the same network segment to login to the administrators settings screen and change the configuration or execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2017-2238|2024-08-05T13:48:05.058Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier and Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2236|2024-08-05T13:48:05.063Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow attackers to perform operations on device with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-16200|2024-08-05T10:17:38.261Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a%20and%20toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw26a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier allows an attacker on the same network segment to execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2017-2235|2024-08-05T13:48:04.342Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier. Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass access restriction to change the administrator account password via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-16197|2024-08-05T10:17:38.375Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a%20and%20toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw26a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier allows an attacker on the same network segment to bypass access restriction to access the information and files stored on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2017-2234|2024-08-05T13:48:04.501Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier may allow remote attackers to access a non-documented developer screen to perform operations on device with administrative privileges.
